hero.title: Simplify your animals management.
hero.desc1: Enter animal and breeding information once to see how each animal relates to the other!
hero.desc2: There is no need to enter the same thing over and over again.

price.title: Use for free
price.desc1: The service will be free of charge at this moment, as it is being developed by an individual.

features.title: Features

registerAnimal.title: Register Animals
registerAnimal.desc: You can register individual animal information. There is no limit to the number of animals that can be registered.

registerBreeding.title: Register breedings
registerBreeding.desc: When a pair (parents) and children are selected, the relationship between the animals is automatically generated and can be viewed from each animal's page.

createFolder.title: Create folders
createFolder.desc: Multiple animals and breedings can be organized in folders and managed as a group.

features.futurePlans: I am constantly developing to add other functions such as pedigree creation and animal sales.
features.sendFeatureRequest: Send features request to the developer
